Text: Great upload mate. Excellent quality. Thnx a lot.
Most underrated movie in my opinion. Its scenes have been plaguirized later in other horror movies, and even games like F.E.A.R. (the girl-ghost standing at the top of stairs)... A must watch....
DEFINATELY ONE OF THE MOST UNDER-RATED MOVIES. A HORROR FANATIC CLASSIC. THANKS SHAUNOKO!!!!!
